title: Newton's Method With $$n=5$$
text: To find $$x_5$$, use the equation $$x_n=x_n-1-\frac{f{\left(x_n-1\right)}}{\operatorname{f'}\left(x_n-1\right)}$$ with $$n=5$$ and the value of $$x_4$$ stored on the calculator.

title: Same Value With Subsequent Application of Newton's Method
text: $$x_6$$ also approximates to $$1.532088886$$. We note that we obtained the same value for $$x_5$$ and $$x_6$$. Therefore, any subsequent application of Newton’s method will most likely give the same value for $$x_n$$.
